reviewText: This is one of the best Martial Art films ever made and it can be expected to be so because of the directorial work of the great Sun Chung. The cast and the fight scenes are first class, aspecially the fighter who use's the golden whip and the villan his techique was powerful. And of course those that follow these type of films know the great work that David Chang has done throughout his career, a classic old school film.
